|void| **apply_impulse**\ (\ impulse\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>`, position\: :ref:`Vector2<class_Vector2>` = Vector2(0, 0)\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_method_apply_impulse>`

å‘å®ä½“æ–½åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå®šä½å†²é‡ã€‚

å†²é‡æ˜¯æ—¶é—´æ— å…³çš„ï¼æ¯å¸§æ–½åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå†²é‡å°†äº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ªä¾èµ–äºå¸§é€Ÿç‡çš„åŠ›ã€‚å‡ºäºè¿™ä¸ªåŸå› ï¼Œå®ƒåº”è¯¥åªåœ¨æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸€æ¬¡æ€§å½±å“æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨ï¼ˆå¦åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨â€œ_forceâ€å‡½æ•°ï¼‰ã€‚

\ ``position`` æ˜¯åœ¨å…¨å±€åæ ‡ä¸­è·å®ä½“åŸç‚¹çš„åç§»é‡ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_method_apply_torque:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **apply_torque**\ (\ torque\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_method_apply_torque>`

åœ¨ä¸å½±å“ä½ç½®çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹æ–½åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ—‹è½¬åŠ›ã€‚åŠ›æ˜¯æ—¶é—´ç›¸å…³çš„ï¼Œè¿™æ„å‘³ç€æ¯æ¬¡ç‰©ç†æ›´æ–°éƒ½ä¼šè¢«æ–½åŠ ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`inverse_inertia<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_property_inverse_inertia>` æ˜¯ç”Ÿæ•ˆæ‰€å¿…éœ€çš„ã€‚è¦æ‹¥æœ‰ :ref:`inverse_inertia<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_property_inverse_inertia>`\ ï¼Œæ´»åŠ¨çš„ :ref:`CollisionShape2D<class_CollisionShape2D>` å¿…é¡»æ˜¯è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¯ä»¥æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¾ç½® :ref:`inverse_inertia<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_property_inverse_inertia>`\ ã€‚

åœ¨ä¸å½±å“ä½ç½®çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå‘å®ä½“æ–½åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ—‹è½¬å†²é‡ã€‚

.. _class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_method_integrate_forces:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

|void| **integrate_forces**\ (\ ) :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_PhysicsDirectBodyState2D_method_integrate_forces>`

Updates the body's linear and angular velocity by applying gravity and damping for the equivalent of one physics tick.

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----
